\   

### Welcome to the INRA NIMBLE Workshop

Today, you'll get an introduction to the `nimble` package for R, including it's use for MCMC, and other statistical algorithms.

We'll also take a look at the `nimbleEcology` package, designed specifically for common ecological model structures.


\  

You can find these notes, and all workshop materials online:

<a href="https://danielturek.github.io/nimble-inra-2019/index" style="color: blue">https://danielturek.github.io/nimble-inra-2019/index</a>

\
